activities: Franchise Brands, LLC is an organization that invests in businesses, either through partnerships or acquisitions. We will be talking to business owners around the world and will be gathering data about the costs of running their operations, their annual sales, their organizations's corporate structure, etc. This information will be used to determine if we are interested in forming a business relationship with a particular company. We will download this information into a database that we have created.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data except Human Resources
recoursemech: European Union and Swiss data protection authorities
